author: Source: Chelmsfordweeklynews.co.uk
title: Essex Police blames hackers for 'indecent image' message - Chelmsfordweeklynews.co.uk
text:
HACKERS are being blamed after a link to an indecent image was posted from Essex Police 's official Twitter account. The force sent out a tweet this morning, apparently advising the public about how to stay secure while browsing the internet.
 Chelmsfordweeklynews.co.uk.
